cause.description:
The Association for the Study of Peak Oil & Gas (ASPO) was founded in 2001 by Dr. Colin Campbell, a retired oil geologist now residing in Ireland. ASPO Ireland is one of over 25 national chapters of ASPO.
ASPO Ireland is organising the 6th Annual International ASPO Conference this year (2007) in Cork, Ireland www.aspo-ireland.org
1. Oil & Gas are finite resources
2. We are heavily dependent on them
3. Their production will peak soon and go into terminable decline
4. We need to be prepared
cause.mission: Raise awareness about the issue of energy security and oil security in particular
cause.name: ASPO Ireland
